effects: 20% chance to counter physical attacks with Dark Retribution (501520) to caster
name: Dark Retribution

desc_short: Chance of reducing dark resistance for one enemy when receiving a physical attack
受到物理攻擊時一定機率降低1名敵人暗屬性耐性的數值

desc_long: Adds chance of reducing dark resistance for one enemy when receiving a physical attack.
受到物理攻擊時，一定機率降低1名敵人暗屬性耐性的數值。
물리공격을 받으면 일정 확률로 적 1명의 어둠속성 저항력을 감소시킵니다.

Posibilidad de reducir la resistencia a la oscuridad de un enemigo al recibir un ataque físico.
